overview:
Ian Haet has entrepreneurial experience traversing multiple sectors spanning 2 decades, including multiple customer-relationship and management-consulting engagements with some of the big-five consulting firms.

Subsequently, as the owner of an international real estate development firm and the founder of four e-commerce startups, he has paid his dues and understands thoroughly what it takes to ‘start-up’ a company.

Combined with his degree in Communication from the University of California, Davis; extensive travel and international business experience, and the fact that he is an expert on Facebook and other social media with a knowledge and foresight unsurpassed in the industry, Mr. Haet brings irreplaceable experience and expertise to the position of President of SSX.
